__e: You tell her that you risked your life to save someone else's, and I think she'll be very proud of you.
Why did you do it? I knew you and Daddy didn't get along, but you risked your life to save me and to prove who killed him.
I'm sorry, but that's who he is, that's who you risked your life to see.
Why did you do it? I knew you and Daddy didn't get along, but you risked your life to save me and to prove who killed him.
I'm sorry, but that's who he is, that's who you risked your life to see.
You risked your freedom for her. That says something. Says that maybe there's still good left in you.
I mean, to him, I'm just some lawyer who never learned his name, but he still risked his life for me.
I even respect your need to do this without the Bureau's help, but you put the people that you care about in danger, and I don't understand or respect that.
After all I put you two through. No one ever risked his life for me.
He risked his career, his home and now you just turn your back on him and leave us out here.
Not one single job for a man who risked his life for his country.
Sir, I know what you did for me, how you risked your life to save me.
I mean, to him, I'm just some lawyer who never learned his name, but he still risked his life for me.
After all I put you two through. No one ever risked his life for me.
I even respect your need to do this without the Bureau's help, but you put the people that you care about in danger, and I don't understand or respect that.
Did you ever risk anything for any cause but your own?
The point is, she went to the mat for you, and she was right.
Sabrina, I've got to tell you, the way you went in there and put yourself on the line for me was... incredible.
And you risked everything to help him, just as I would for my father.
- He has risked everything for me. - I can do no less than stand by him.
You risked everything for me, and no one's ever done anything like that for me before.
Oh, please, you took a big chance coming here.
I know that my dad risked a lot to protect you, I just don't know why.
He's risking lot for something he's knows can't happen.
